description: Defines the Polymer.IronSelection class for managing item selection, including methods for getting, clearing, selecting, toggling, and checking selection state.

classes.name: Polymer.IronSelection
classes.description: Class for managing selection of items, with support for multi-selection and callbacks.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the selected item(s), either as a single item or an array depending on the 'multi' property.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all selections except those specified in the 'excludes' array.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.description: Checks if a given item is currently selected.

methods.name: setItemSelected
methods.description: Sets the selection state for a specific item and invokes the callback if provided.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects an item; toggles if 'multi' is true.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the selection state of an item.
